q1.question: Who is running City Of Seekers?
q1.answer: City Of Seekers is run by a young, motivated team united through the global YesFam community, originally inspired by the YouTube channel Yes Theory. This community believes in challenging comfort zones to fully experience life. While our event is not directly connected to the YesFam community or Yes Theory, we share the same vision: to create connections and learn new things by seeking discomfort.

q2.question: Who is it for?
q2.answer: City of Seekers is an event to welcome people of all ages, genders, races & religions. A place to create new friendships, constructively seek discomfort and challenge yourself among a group of like-minded people.

q3.question: Do we have Rules?
q3.answer: Yes, we have a Ruleset or Code of Conduct to clarify how we want to treat each other, find it <1>here</1> or under <3>cityofseekers.eu/code</3>.

q4.question: When is it happening?
q4.answer: City of Seekers 25 will happen for the third time from June 19th to 22th of 2025

q5.question: Arrival & departure
q5.answer: More details will be announced closer to the event. Arrival will start in the afternoon of the 6th of June. You can come by car, train, bike or whatever you feel like. We'd ask you to departure around noon on the 9th of June.

q6.question: Is there a schedule
q6.answer: The detailed schedule will be released closer to the event date. Keep an eye on our Instagram for the latest updates.

q7.question: Will there be food and drinks?
q7.answer: We will sell a selection of snacks like chips, sweets or nuts as well as water, sodas and beers. We will have a BYOF BBQ (bring your own food) and a pizza night on one evening each. Please bring your own food for the rest of the days. More details will follow.

q8.question: What does the ticket price cover?
q8.answer: The ticket price includes entry, access to all infrastructure and workshops, and free evening programs. It does not cover food, drinks, and transportation. The ticket price is set to cover our expenses for COS without taking profit.

q9.question: What about food?
q9.answer: Please bring your own cooking supplies for meal preparation. A campfire will be available for BBQ. Last year, we also organized a pizza night with orders from a local restaurant.

q10.question: Do we need volunteers?
q10.answer: We don't specifically require volunteers. However, if you're interested in helping or hosting a workshop, feel free to reach out to us. If we need volunteers we will communicate that over our instagram/website.

q11.question: Animals
q11.answer: While animals are not typically suited for such environments, we leave the decision to bring them to your discretion. Please be mindful of your responsibility for their well-being. If your Animal puts other guests/animals at risk you will have to leash it.

q12.question: Cancellation Policy
q12.answer: Paid tickets are non-refundable. If you need to transfer your ticket to someone else, please inform us with their details for validation. If you're unable to attend and can't find a replacement, contact us. We may assist if there's a waiting list.

q13.question: Liability and Theft
q13.answer: City of Seekers is not liable for damage or theft of personal belongings. We strive for a safe environment but cannot guarantee the security of personal items. Please take care of your belongings.

q14.question: Nature
q14.answer: With our event, we try to burden the environment as little as possible. For this, we need your help. Please respect nature and the environment on the campsite and in the surrounding area. That means: Please throw rubbish (bottles, cigarettes, etc.) in the trashcan and not in nature. Cigarettes and glass in particular are not only pollution, but they also increase the risk of forest fires.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: The information provided on this website has been carefully checked and is regularly updated. However, no guarantee can be given that all information is complete, correct, and up-to-date at all times. This applies in particular to all connections ("links") to other websites that are referred to directly or indirectly. All information can be added, removed, or changed without prior notice.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: Welcome to City Of Seekers! Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting the personal information you choose to share with us. This Data Policy explains the types of information we collect, how we use it, and the measures we take to keep your information safe.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.text: We only collect information that you voluntarily provide to us. This may include:

items.contact: Contact Information: When you get in touch with us via our contact form or sign up for our newsletter, we may collect your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.
items.transaction: Transaction Information: If you purchase a ticket to our festival, we will collect necessary information to process the transaction, such as your name, email address, and payment details.

maps.title: Google Maps
maps.text1: Our website uses Google Maps to provide location-based services and interactive maps. When you interact with Google Maps on our website, Google may collect information about your device and interaction with the map, including your IP address and location data. This information is collected and used by Google in accordance with their
maps.text2: We do not have control over and are not responsible for Google's data collection and usage practices. We encourage you to review Google's Privacy Policy to understand how your information is being used.
maps.consent: Please note that your use of Google Maps on our website is subject to your consent to allow cookies and other tracking technologies that Google may use. If you prefer not to have your data collected through Google Maps, we advise not to use this feature on our website.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.text: We use the information you provide to:
items: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support.
Process transactions and send you related information, including confirmations and receipts.
Keep you updated about the festival, including announcements, updates, and any changes to the event.

security.title: Data Security
security.text: We take the security of your personal information seriously and implement a variety of security measures to help protect it. However, no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us at:

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this Data Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on our website. You are advised to review this Data Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about this Data Policy, please contact us at:

q1.question: Wer organisiert City Of Seekers?
q1.answer: City Of Seekers wird von einem jungen, motivierten Team organisiert, das sich durch die globale YesFam-Community zusammengefunden hat, inspiriert vom YouTube-Kanal Yes Theory. Diese Community glaubt daran, Komfortzonen herauszufordern, um das Leben voll zu erleben. Auch wenn unsere Veranstaltung nicht direkt mit der YesFam-Community oder Yes Theory verbunden ist, teilen wir dieselbe Vision: Verbindungen schaffen und Neues lernen durch das Suchen von Diskomfort.

q2.question: F√ºr wen ist es gedacht?
q2.answer: City of Seekers ist eine Veranstaltung, die Menschen aller Altersgruppen, Geschlechter, Rassen und Religionen willkommen hei√üt. Ein Ort, um neue Freundschaften zu kn√ºpfen, konstruktiv Diskomfort zu suchen und sich selbst in einer Gruppe Gleichgesinnter herauszufordern.

q3.question: Gibt es Regeln?
q3.answer: Ja, wir haben ein Regelwerk oder einen Verhaltenskodex, der kl√§rt, wie wir miteinander umgehen m√∂chten. Du findest ihn <1>hier</1> oder unter <3>cityofseekers.eu/code</3>.

q4.question: Wann findet es statt?
q4.answer: City of Seekers 25 findet zum dritten Mal vom 19. bis 22. Juni 2025 statt

q5.question: An- und Abreise
q5.answer: Weitere Details werden kurz vor der Veranstaltung bekannt gegeben. Die Anreise beginnt am Nachmittag des 6. Juni. Du kannst mit dem Auto, Zug, Fahrrad oder wie auch immer du m√∂chtest anreisen. Wir bitten um Abreise gegen Mittag am 9. Juni.

q6.question: Gibt es einen Zeitplan?
q6.answer: Der detaillierte Zeitplan wird kurz vor der Veranstaltung ver√∂ffentlicht. Verfolge unseren Instagram-Account f√ºr die neuesten Updates.

q7.question: Wird es Essen und Getr√§nke geben?
q7.answer: Wir verkaufen eine Auswahl an Snacks wie Chips, S√º√üigkeiten oder N√ºsse sowie Wasser, Softdrinks und Bier. Wir werden einen BYOF BBQ (Bring dein eigenes Essen) und einen Pizzaabend an je einem Abend haben. Bitte bring dein eigenes Essen f√ºr die restlichen Tage mit. Weitere Details folgen.

q8.question: Was ist im Ticketpreis enthalten?
q8.answer: Der Ticketpreis beinhaltet den Eintritt, Zugang zu allen Einrichtungen und Workshops sowie kostenlose Abendprogramme. Er deckt keine Verpflegung, Getr√§nke und Transport. Der Ticketpreis ist so kalkuliert, dass er unsere Kosten f√ºr COS deckt, ohne Gewinn zu machen.

q9.question: Was ist mit dem Essen?
q9.answer: Bitte bring deine eigenen Kochutensilien zur Essenszubereitung mit. Ein Lagerfeuer wird f√ºr Grillen zur Verf√ºgung stehen. Letztes Jahr haben wir auch einen Pizzaabend mit Bestellungen von einem lokalen Restaurant organisiert.

q10.question: Brauchen wir Freiwillige?
q10.answer: Wir ben√∂tigen keine speziellen Freiwilligen. Wenn du jedoch Interesse hast zu helfen oder einen Workshop anzubieten, melde dich gerne bei uns. Falls wir Freiwillige brauchen, werden wir das √ºber unseren Instagram-Account/Website kommunizieren.

q11.question: Tiere
q11.answer: Obwohl Tiere f√ºr solche Umgebungen normalerweise nicht geeignet sind, √ºberlassen wir die Entscheidung, sie mitzubringen, deinem Ermessen. Bitte sei dir deiner Verantwortung f√ºr ihr Wohlbefinden bewusst. Wenn dein Tier andere G√§ste/Tiere gef√§hrdet, musst du es anleinen.

q12.question: Stornierungsbedingungen
q12.answer: Bezahlte Tickets sind nicht erstattungsf√§hig. Wenn du dein Ticket an jemand anderen √ºbertragen m√∂chtest, informiere uns bitte mit deren Daten zur Validierung. Wenn du nicht teilnehmen kannst und keinen Ersatz findest, kontaktiere uns. Wir k√∂nnen m√∂glicherweise helfen, wenn es eine Warteliste gibt.

q13.question: Haftung und Diebstahl
q13.answer: City of Seekers haftet nicht f√ºr Besch√§digung oder Diebstahl von pers√∂nlichem Eigentum. Wir bem√ºhen uns um eine sichere Umgebung, k√∂nnen aber die Sicherheit pers√∂nlicher Gegenst√§nde nicht garantieren. Bitte achte auf deine Sachen.

q14.question: Natur
q14.answer: Mit unserer Veranstaltung versuchen wir, die Umwelt so wenig wie m√∂glich zu belasten. Daf√ºr brauchen wir deine Hilfe. Bitte respektiere die Natur und Umwelt auf dem Campingplatz und in der Umgebung. Das bedeutet: Bitte wirf M√ºll (Flaschen, Zigaretten etc.) in den M√ºlleimer und nicht in die Natur. Besonders Zigaretten und Glas sind nicht nur Umweltverschmutzung, sondern erh√∂hen auch die Waldbrandgefahr.
